 Requirements
 
AdvaS should run on any more recent i386-compatible machine using GNU/Linux, UNIX or FreeBSD. Specific changes for other OS are to be done. Advas is written in the programming language python (http://www.python.org) and requires both the python 2.0+ libraries and the interpreter to be installed.

Currently, AdvaS needs about 4Mbyte of disc space including documentation and examples.
